name: Rainn and Skye
description:
Drive your girlfriend home in the rain and chat with her about cutesy things. It's a short, queer and kind of romantic game about a simple moment of life.

Controls:

  • Mouse: Camera
  • WASD: Acceleration and turning
  • Space bar: Brake
  • Escape: Quit

--

This game is a submission for Rainbow Jam 2019. It was developed in just 10 days, so beware that there might be quite a few rough corners (pun totally not intended.)

If you encounter any bugs or problems running the game, let me know and I'll try to fix them. The game could have used much more testing and polishing, but, well, this is how game jams work.
